name: Flipside (Andrew Ingram)
description:
Gravity-changing, portal-inspired, game for Mini Jam 128.

Controls:
W, A, D : movement
Left click [hold] : charge gravity-gun (only after gravity gun is obtained)

Instructions:
Make it up before time runs out! Gems restore 10 seconds.

WARNING:
You are not supposed to be able to change gravity on the dark panels in the final level. However, due to a glitch in the Godot game engine, I was not able to properly implement this feature. I might fix in the future.
